title: Crankbrothers New Speed Lace in Mallet and Stamp Shoes
content:
One of our favorite shoe designs we saw at the Sea Otter Classic was the Crankbrothers Speed Lace silhouette. This hybrid lacing system relies on a rip chord closure and cinch that tucks inside the top of the tongue, giving it a clean look without a BOA design or big, floppy laces to manage. The Speed Lace comes in the Stamp flat and Mallet clipless designs and comes in two of our favorite colors: fuck yeah, Olive Drab and Desert Tan!

Check ’em out at Crankbrothers.
